required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Study of Injection HB002.1T in Subjects With Solid Tumor
clinical_study.official_title: A Phase 1, Safety, Tolerability and Pharmacokinetic Profile Study of Intravenous Injections of HB002.1T (a Vascular Endothelial Growth Factor Receptor Decoy) in Subjects With Solid Tumor

brief_summary.textblock: The objectives of this study are to evaluate the safety, tolerability, and pharmacokinetic profile of HB002.1T, a human immunoglobulin Fc fusion protein containing domain 2 and flanking sequence of vascular endothelial growth factor (VEGF) receptor-1 in subjects with solid tumor.

primary_outcome.measure: Dose-limiting toxicity (DLT) defined as grade 3 or higher National Cancer Institute - Common Terminology Criteria (NCI-CTC) toxicities
primary_outcome.description: Dose-limiting toxicity (DLT) defined as grade 3 or higher National Cancer Institute - Common Terminology Criteria (NCI-CTC) toxicities

secondary_outcome.measure: Titer and detection rate of anti drug antibody
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 1,8,15,and 21 days after the first treatment, at the end of each treatment cycle (cycle 1 is 21 days, cycle 2 to 5 is 14 days) , and and up to 28 days after last treatment
secondary_outcome.description: Titer and detection rate of anti drug antibody

secondary_outcome.time_frame: 7 days before first treatment, at the end of treatment cycle 4 and cycle 5 (cycle 1 is 21 days, cycle 2 to 5 is 14 days)
7 days before first treatment, at the end of treatment cycle 4 and cycle 5 (cycle 1 is 21 days, cycle 2 to 5 is 14 days)
7 days before first treatment, at the end of treatment cycle 4 and cycle 5 (cycle 1 is 21 days, cycle 2 to 5 is 14 days)
1,8,15,and 21 days after the first treatment, at the end of each treatment cycle (cycle 1 is 21 days, cycle 2 to 5 is 14 days) , and and up to 28 days after last treatment

secondary_outcome.measure: Area Under the Plasma Concentration Versus Time Curve (AUC)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 1,8,15,and 21 days after the first treatment, at the end of each treatment cycle (cycle 1 is 21 days, cycle 2 to 5 is 14 days) , and and up to 28 days after last treatment
secondary_outcome.description: Area under the plasma concentration versus time curve (AUC) of patients

arm_group.description: Participants received a 2mg/kg dose of HB002.1T via intravenous injection.
Participants received a 4mg/kg dose of HB002.1T via intravenous injection.
Participants received a 8mg/kg dose of HB002.1T via intravenous injection.
Participants received a 12mg/kg dose of HB002.1T via intravenous injection.
Participants received a 16mg/kg dose of HB002.1T via intravenous injection.
Participants received a 20mg/kg dose of HB002.1T via intravenous injection.

intervention.description: HB002.1T is a Vascular Endothelial Growth Factor Receptor Decoy
